00007 ServiceFromXML::~ServiceFromXML()

00011 ServiceFromXML::ServiceFromXML(const SimpleString file_name)
00012 {
00013   XMLTreeParser xmlTreeParser;
00014   xmlDocPtr doc = xmlTreeParser.ParseFile(file_name);
00015   if(doc != NULL)
00016     {
00017                 //delete doc;
00018       InitServiceFromXml(xmlDocGetRootElement(doc));
00019       xmlFreeDoc( doc );
00020     }
00021 }
00022 
00023 void ServiceFromXML::InitServiceFromXml(xmlNodePtr root_node)
00024 {
00025   xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", root_node);
00026   if(attr_name != NULL) SetServiceName((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00027   
00028   xmlNodePtr cur_node = root_node->children;
00029   for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00030     {
00031       if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00032         {         
00033           SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00034           if( cur_name == VariableAttribut::variable_str )
00035             {
00036               ProcessVariableAttribut(cur_node);
00037             }
00038           else if( cur_name == InOutputAttribut::input_str ||
00039                    cur_name == InOutputAttribut::output_str ||
00040                   cur_name == InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str )
00041             {
00042               ProcessInOutputAttribut(cur_node);
00043             }
00044           else
00045             {
00046               fprintf(stderr, "unknown node : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00047             }
00048         }
00049     }          
00050 }
00051 
00052 void ServiceFromXML::ProcessVariableAttribut(xmlNodePtr node)
00053 {
00054   xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00055   if(attr_name)
00056   {
00057     VariableAttribut* va = AddVariable((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00058     va->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00059   }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void ServiceFromXML::ProcessInOutputAttribut(xmlNodePtr node)
00063 {
00064   ConnectorKind kind_of_input = AnInOutput;
00065   SimpleString node_name = (const char*)node->name;
00066   if ( node_name == InOutputAttribut::input_str )
00067   {
00068     kind_of_input = AnInput;
00069   }
00070   else if ( node_name == InOutputAttribut::output_str )
00071   {
00072     kind_of_input = AnOutput;
00073   }
00074   
00075   xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00076   if(attr_name)
00077   {
00078     InOutputAttribut* ioa = AddInOutput((const char*)attr_name->children->content, NULL, kind_of_input);
00079     ioa->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00080   }
00081 }
